C

calcBreakeven() - Method in class AbstractOption
calcBreakeven determines the breakeven point of the Option, regardless of its OptionType, call or put, or OptionPosition, long or short.
calcBreakeven() - Method in interface Derivative
CalcBreakeven determines the breakeven point of an option, no matter if it is a call or put option.
calcProfit(int) - Method in class Option
calcProfit calculates the profit, or loss, of the Option at any given stock price.It considers the type of option, call or put, and the position on it taken by the investor, long or short.
calcTotalPremium() - Method in class Strategy
This method returns the total cost of the strategy by using higher order functions to combine all premiums in the optionList.
calculateProfit(int) - Method in class Equity
calculateProfit takes in some future price point the stock can be at.

compareTo(Point) - Method in class Point
 
contains(String) - Method in class TickerList
contains allows the model to check if a requested stock ticker is valid or invalid.
createTickerMap() - Method in class TickerList
createTickerMap parses a text file containing stock symbols and inputs them into a HashSet.
crossesZero(BigDecimal, BigDecimal) - Method in class Strategy
crossZero is a method that determines whether there is a breakeven between two different P&L points.
